formattedAddress: 587 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10037, USA
adrFormatAddress: 587 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10037, USA

originalText.text: DO NOT SHOP THERE.THEY ARE RUDE, AND DISGUSTINGLY ARROGANT TO TAKE ORDERS

text.text: DO NOT SHOP THERE.THEY ARE RUDE, AND DISGUSTINGLY ARROGANT TO TAKE ORDERS

originalText.text: I usually only post good reviews but today and previous days I did not appreciate the VERY RUDE..person who takes the orders.I almost hung up. The Food is good..I like it but this is my last day ordering delivery from here.    the 4 for service is for the delivery person who is always polite.

text.text: I usually only post good reviews but today and previous days I did not appreciate the VERY RUDE..person who takes the orders.I almost hung up. The Food is good..I like it but this is my last day ordering delivery from here.    the 4 for service is for the delivery person who is always polite.

originalText.text:
Count up the price on your order because they will definitely attempt to over charge you. I’ve ordered several times and like clock work the lady will give a price (she’ll only tell you the price if you ask) that’s higher than the menu price( she’s attempted to overcharge by up to $7 before). Then, when you tell her that price isn’t correct, she acts like it’s a mistake, she’ll “recalculate”, and then the new price will be lower, but again overpriced. Then you can try bringing her down to the actual price and depending on her audacity that day, she may drop the bs , or she may budge only a little from the second fake price and deny from there.

I kid you not. Every single time.

originalText.text: This restaurant should be reported to the department of health.  I made the mistake of ordering fried chicken, and spare ribs, and shrimp with lobster sauce, and spare ribs , not cut up.  As they were preparing the chicken, a piece fell on the floor, the cook didn’t see it fall, and stepped back on the chicken.  I saw this man pick up the piece of chicken and put the chicken back in the drier with the other chicken . I asked him why did he do that and he then spoke in a thick Chinese accent that he put the chicken in the garbage.  The cooks did not have cooking gloves on and the other orders were messed up also.

originalText.text: First thing first, the service was HORRIBLE!!!  I had to call the restaurant 3 times just to have the delivery guy buzz up.  His excuse was that he had a bike... get a chain and lock it up and DO YOUR JOB!  Plus the food was mediocre at best as well.  My roommate told me he had the exact same experience with them as well.  We will NEVER order from them again!
